Interface GymOwnerDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
GymOwnerDAOImpl
public interface GymOwnerDAO
Data Access Object interface for gym owner operations. Handles gym center management, including adding centers and slots, and performing CRUD operations on owner-owned gym assets.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addGymCenter(GymCenter gymCenter)
    Adds a new gym center to the system on behalf of the owner.
    boolean
    addSlot(Slot slot)
    Adds a new time slot to a specific gym center.
    boolean
    deleteGymCenter(int centerId)
    Deletes a gym center from the system.
    GymCenter
    getGymCenterById(int centerId)
    Retrieves a gym center by its unique persistent ID.
    boolean
    updateGymCenter(GymCenter gymCenter)
    Updates the details of an existing gym center.
    List<GymCenter>
    viewMyGymCenters(int ownerId)
    Retrieves all gym centers owned by a specific owner.

  • Method Details

    • addGymCenter

      boolean addGymCenter(GymCenter gymCenter)
      Adds a new gym center to the system on behalf of the owner.
      Parameters:
      gymCenter - the GymCenter object to be added
      Returns:
      true if the center was successfully added

    • addSlot

      boolean addSlot(Slot slot)
      Adds a new time slot to a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      slot - the Slot object to be added
      Returns:
      true if the slot was successfully added

    • viewMyGymCenters

      List<GymCenter> viewMyGymCenters(int ownerId)
      Retrieves all gym centers owned by a specific owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the unique ID of the gym owner
      Returns:
      a list of GymCenter objects belonging to the owner

    • updateGymCenter

      boolean updateGymCenter(GymCenter gymCenter)
      Updates the details of an existing gym center.
      Parameters:
      gymCenter - the GymCenter object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful

    • deleteGymCenter

      boolean deleteGymCenter(int centerId)
      Deletes a gym center from the system.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful

    • getGymCenterById

      GymCenter getGymCenterById(int centerId)
      Retrieves a gym center by its unique persistent ID.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique center ID
      Returns:
      the GymCenter object, or null if not found
